topics.body:
> On LoE forums
> Stuff happening on a thread about age
> One-sided argument about 4chan.
> Join in on that to make it less one-sided
> But that's besides the point

> Thread's about the userbase's age
> All well into 18 and beyond, some mid-teens as second-place
> Point out that the rules are not reflective of the demographic and such
> People try to tell me wrong
> Taking the current poll and comparing it to Brony studies, gaming studies, and MMO studies I conclude that: no there will be no under 12's and there's no point in pandering to them
> Guy anecdotal's me
> Gives excuses about how 18 year olds don't like lewd jokes sometimes
> "counter.":http://forum.legendsofequestria.com/index.php?topic=12976.msg847758#msg847758

I can not contain the keks.
